revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Hau'oli Cemetery |image = [[File:Hau'oli Cemetery.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Hau'oli Cemetery. |tokens = 800,000 |location = East of Route 2. }}
<!--T:2--> '''Hau'oli Cemetery''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,587,450 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Pokémon Breeder (female).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Ikue || [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || [[File:Office Worker (male).png|40px]] Office Worker Jeremy || [[File:Pikipek.png|40px]] Pikipek |- | [[File:Misdreavus.png|40px]] Misdreavus || [[File:Preschooler (female).png|40px]] Preschooler Malia || [[File:Happiny.png|40px]] Happiny |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Drifloon.png|40px]] Drifloon || rowspan=2|<center>28,968,625 || rowspan=2 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Litwick.png|40px]] Litwick |- |}
